text:
Message 48 of 4024
So honestly, I think Max will stick around through lunch. But may want to go home after. His big Santa gift needs to be hooked up to his computer.
I’ll keep you in the loop. Thanks for being so flexible today.
I really appreciate the partnership,Christine.
Sent:12/25/2023 at 11:17 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/25/2023 at 11:27 AM)
Subject:Re: Pick up
Message 49 of 4024
Ok. Have him text me and if I’m on a hike or out and about I’ll ask him to Uber.
I don’t plan to be on this app all day so assume future communications will just be emergencies.
My perspective is you are using it to reach out more than normal then add a question where you will say you needed a response.
Sent:12/25/2023 at 11:29 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/25/2023 at 11:41 AM)
Subject:Re: Pick up
Message 50 of 4024
We agree. I think we need to dial it WAY back.
Hopefully it was just because there was so much planning and details we did not think about. I think it will behoove us to really be sure we include as
much needed info in the first back and forth, rather than a death by a 1k cuts, fine tuning later.
We have the right tool, let’s learn how to use it right and use it to our mutual advantage. I’m also learning more about things like the “tone meter” and
scheduling. I’ll share in one go instead of piecemeal as I was tempted to do initially.
If there is an emergency I’ll text you. Otherwise I don’t plan to be pinging you here during my time. Thanks!
Sent:12/25/2023 at 11:47 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/25/2023 at 11:47 AM)
Subject:Re: Pick up
Message 51 of 4024
I’m heading to barre this am. Was thinking pick up at 10am. Lmk if that’s an issue.
Sent:12/26/2023 at 08:15 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/26/2023 at 09:59 AM)
Subject:Re: Pick up
